item.title: Pot hole in middle of road, 21st December
item.description:
The pothole has appeared very quickly outside number 19 just before the speed bump. I assume where the drains have been blocking, Water has got into the road surface and froze as now there is a pothole and a crack forming from one side of the road to the other. I feel this will become a lot larger very quickly due to the amount of traffic that use this road and it will quickly become dangerous for motorcyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brooklands Park, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked. Pedestrians getting soaked by traffic., 21st December
item.description:
Drain outside no 109 - 111 Bath Road just north of Morans. I have reported this recently but thought I received a message it was resolved and case closed. But problem is the same. So I am reporting again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge flooded again on Thursday evening., 21st December
item.description:
Under bridge. There is an increasing amount of mud/soil/vegetation under the bridge and around the drains. Please could this be dug out for the length of the bridge to help with flooding during heavy rain? Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 20th December
item.description:
Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection. Two bags, one containing general litter and the other cans/plastic bottles for recycling. Also one nitrous oxide cylinder. Bags left next to litter bin 0230. Cheltenham Road/Nine Elms Road Junction bus stop, Longlevens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
